TopicTitle: Planes Showcase: SHOW OF YOUR SPACE/ATMOSPHERIC PLANES!

Articles.Content:
hi guys, i just want to make a thread that would acknowledge the effort of plane designers and compile all planes for easier access and reference. I hope this would be as widely accepted as other successful showcase threads.

RULES:

1. Screenshots are necessary.

2. ADD A DESCRIPTION.

3. Mods are ok, but please refrain from uploading too many mod planes: I still want this to be kept a mainly stock thread.

I will start with my crow jet, recently featured by heretic391

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/yh0o1xfJJ6Y?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/IvjDO)

The Crow is a drone jet that can achieve hypersonic speeds EASILY. It can lift off on 35 m/s and (seriously) usually accidentally goes mach on cruise. This jet is still not totally developed, so feel free to modify this craft, (if you repost, please give me credit)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-28T03:14:19Z" title="05/28/2015 03:14  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 28, 2015</time> by Goodle...**
  
rules

> 
> STOCK ONLY.

Considering this chops out pretty much anything using B9, Firespitter, or the other dozen or so smaller plane packs out there . . . Good luck enforcing that, or at least expect this to be a very short showcase.
ok i will lift that.

EPIC! (5 characters)

SSTOs for looks only xD

![fp9e3pX.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/fp9e3pX.jpg)

A multi-role light weight easy-to-fly SSTO capable of 80km LKO, to be used for shuttling crew, utility and research, and any other space endeavors. By default is unarmed, but features light armor plating (because you'll never know when you'll NEED armor plating) Additional features are having a K.L.A.W. in its rear and a fancy utility research bay laboratory complete with an ion escape pod, go figure ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

![m4zcLiB.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/m4zcLiB.jpg)

Another multi-role SSTO with high maneuverability and relative ease of controls, capable of a stack 100km LKO. Designed for shuttling crew, or utility and research, or interplanetary endeavors if installed with an interplanetary engine module. Also has light plating to protect the ultra-sensitive engine cluster from... anything. Additional features are having 4 dawn ion engines for the super-efficient burns, and that fancy utility research bay laboratory complete with an ion escape pod. Also aerodynamically shaped like a star to fit your shooting star ascent profile ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

![x8Ykucd.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/x8Ykucd.jpg)

Not a multi-role SSTO, well, not available for shuttling the least, but designed for interplanetary exciting-boring endeavors (interplanetary engine module required), capable of a 100km LKO, to be used for utility and research purposes, or a two-man mission to the unknown. Also has light plating for protection, because you can never get enough protection ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Additional features are having 4 dawn ion engines for the super-efficient burns, and that fancy utility research bay laboratory complete with an ion escape pod, and has a large fuel capacity for those delta-V rosters ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
